prompts.prompt: I need to create a pull request for the bug fix I just committed
Can you help me open a PR? I added a new feature to the authentication module
I want to submit my changes as a pull request but I'm not sure what information to include
Help me create a pull request that follows our team's standards - I fixed issue #247 related to database connection timeouts
I need to open a PR for my performance improvements but I see there are multiple PR templates in the .github folder - which one should I use?
Create a pull request for my UI changes - I updated the dashboard layout and fixed some responsive design issues
I've been working on three different components and made commits for accessibility improvements, API refactoring, and documentation updates - can you help me create a proper pull request?
My team requires conventional commit format and has strict PR templates with checklists - I need help creating a PR for the security vulnerability fix that addresses issues #89, #102, and #156
I want to submit a pull request but I need to make sure all the checklist items are properly marked and the description follows our repository guidelines exactly
Set up a pull request for my work - I need the title to follow conventional commits, link to the related epic, and make sure I haven't missed any required sections in our PR template
